FuncDef:
The mld on-demand command configures the Multicast Listener Discovery (MLD) group that an interface dynamically joins not to time out.
The undo mld on-demand command restores the default configuration. The mld on-demand command configures the Multicast Listener Discovery (MLD) group that an interface dynamically joins not to time out. The undo mld on-demand command restores the default configuration. By default, the records about dynamic join to multicast groups on an interface age periodically. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,50GE interface view,Eth-Trunk interface view,Loopback interface view,VLANIF interface view
